name: Rob Schneider
summary: Rob Schneider. Actor: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo. Robert Michael "Rob" Schneider (born October 31, 1963) is an American actor, comedian, screenwriter, and director. A stand-up comic and veteran of the NBC sketch comedy series Saturday Night Live (1975), Schneider has gone on to a successful career in feature films, including starring roles in the comedy films Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo (1999), The Hot Chick (2002), and Grown Ups (2010).
awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys | 1 win & 17 nominations total
